item.description:
Hi, I’m Andres Viloria ðŸ‘‹

I find excitement in the world of dataâ€”unraveling its stories and unlocking hidden treasures is what I do best! My journey began as an engineer, where I honed my skills in understanding, processing, and bringing data to life. Now, I’m on an exhilarating path as a data scientist, driven by a passion for turning raw information into valuable insights.

I’ve got a great track record when it comes to understanding, cleaning up, and making data look amazing. I’m like a wizard with programming languagesâ€”SQL, R, and Python are my secret potions for talking to computers.

Tools like SQL Server Management Studio, Jupyter Notebook, Power BI, SSIS, Anaconda, and IBM Cloud are my sidekicks. They help me turn boring data into exciting insights.

I’m a team player with a sharp mind and a get-things-done attitude. Put me in a group, and I’ll help us reach our goals while making sure our work shines.

Currently, I’m expanding my skills with the Data Analytics program at Langara College. It’s like adding more tools to my data toolkit, making me even better at what I do.
